production.backend: ssh -i aws_key.pem -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ec2-user@51.84.91.162 "cd /home/ec2-user/chatwithoats && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml logs backend -f --tail=100"
production.wuzapi: ssh -i aws_key.pem -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ec2-user@51.84.91.162 "cd /home/ec2-user/chatwithoats && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml logs wuzapi --tail=50"
production.all_services: ssh -i aws_key.pem -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ec2-user@51.84.91.162 "cd /home/ec2-user/chatwithoats && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml logs -f"

production.docker_status: ssh -i aws_key.pem -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ec2-user@51.84.91.162 "cd /home/ec2-user/chatwithoats && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml ps"
production.docker_services: ssh -i aws_key.pem -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ec2-user@51.84.91.162 "cd /home/ec2-user/chatwithoats && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml ps --format table"
production.list_containers: ssh -i aws_key.pem -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ec2-user@51.84.91.162 "cd /home/ec2-user/chatwithoats && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml ps --services"

queries.recent_logs: psql -d dev_db -c 'SELECT * FROM logs ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;'

queries.user_count: heroku pg:psql --app your-app -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;'
queries.recent_logs: heroku pg:psql --app your-app -c 'SELECT * FROM logs ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;'

ai_prompts.analyze_logs: Analyze these log entries and identify any issues, errors, or patterns that need attention:
ai_prompts.deployment_summary: Summarize the deployment status and highlight any issues:
ai_prompts.test_analysis: Analyze these test results and provide insights on failures and recommendations:
